titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3630) to provide incentives for the creation of jobs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-400, by Mr. Scott (SC).

All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read. The previous question shall be considered as ordered on the conference report to its adoption without intervening motion except: (1) one hour of debate; and (2) one motion to recommit, if applicable.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 113.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 554.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/16/2012--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3630) to provide incentives for the creation of jobs.
